title: Manager - Supply Chain Data Engineering & Programs
summary: The Business Process Reengineering team in India is looking for a Manager to drive global supply chain improvement programs in unlocking supply chain efficiency enabling our functional business teams to execute operations more effectively via process automation or enhanced data visibility, all while leading a high performant functional team.
description: As a Manager with the WW Business Process Re-Engineering team based in India, you will lead a team of highly skilled program managers and will work with globally dispersed cross-functional teams in driving programs and solving complex business problems.
key_qualifications: 12+ years of global Supply Chain solutioning experience, including 5+ yrs of people management, across multiple industry sectors, with High Tech strongly preferred. A minimum of 8 years of supply chain solutions implementation expertise in Planning, Procurement, Logistics or Fulfilment areas. Advanced Data Analytics using ML, LLM and Optimisation solutions implementation experience is a plus. Proven experience as a people manager having effectively managed & mentored a highly productive team, developing and tracking key performance metrics for the team. Proven ability to facilitate and lead brainstorming sessions, give ideas shape, design future-state Business processes and systems.
education_experience: Advanced degree (MS/MBA) in the field of Supply Chain, Operations or Planning is preferred. APICS and ML/LLM certifications are nice to have. Project Management certifications are desirable.
